name: Slendrina: The Forest
summary:
It's time again with a new scary adventure with Slendrina.
This time it will be your mission to find out the dark secret that hides in the dark forest.

You need to find some keys and tools to succeed.
And as always, watch out for Slendrina and turn around as soon as you see her.
You must also be careful so you do not face Slendrinas mother.
